p:
The block diagram of the proposed SEIRS model with time delay is shown in Fig. 1. The system with time delay is assumed to be stable and will exhibit similar disease-free equilibrium and endemic equilibrium properties as the system without time delay provided that the time delay parameters are nonnegative, i.e.
τ
σ
≥ 0 ,
τ
ξ
≥ 0
. Detailed discussions on the theoretical stability analysis of SEIR and similar epidemic models with time delay can be found in studies such as [19], [25], [26], [27].
